# Day 885

![Be fruitful](https://miro.medium.com/1*-aa4LhJXtwR5hplfHxJu9Q.png)

**The Power of Abundance**

Abundance has a profound effect on our lives. When we have enough, we're free to focus on creating value for others, rather than constantly worrying about protecting what we have. This mindset shift allows us to play positive-sum games, where everyone benefits, rather than zero-sum games, where one person's gain comes at another's expense.

When we're not consumed by scarcity, we can allocate our energy towards producing something of value, whether it's a product, service, or idea. This, in turn, attracts more abundance, creating a virtuous cycle.

The question is, do you have an abundance mindset or a scarcity mindset? Those who believe they can create, produce, and make a difference tend to be rewarded, while those who focus on the negative tend to stagnate.

So, what can you do today to cultivate an abundance mindset? Be fruitful, share your talents and resources with others, and ignore the naysayers. Yes, there are problems to solve, but complaining won't fix them. Taking action, creating solutions, and spreading positivity will.

As you go about your day, remember that abundance begets abundance. Money, love, happiness - they all multiply when we focus on creating more, rather than hoarding what we have. You attract what you are, so attract positivity, generosity, and kindness. The world will respond in kind.

8/23/24

Conor Jay Chepenik
